Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper

Class InstrumentedComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper.BaseHelper<X>
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper.BaseComparatorHelper<X>
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper.InstrumentedComparatorHelper<X>
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper.InstrumentedComparableHelper<X>
Type Parameters:
X - the underlying type (must be Comparable).
All Implemented Interfaces:
Helper<X>, Instrument, NonComparableHelper<X>, AutoCloseable, Comparator<X>
public class InstrumentedComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>> extends InstrumentedComparatorHelper<X>
Helper class for sorting methods with instrumentation of compares and swaps, and in addition, bounds checks. This Helper class may be used for analyzing sort methods but will run at slightly slower speeds than the superclass.

  • Constructor Details

    • InstrumentedComparableHelper

      public InstrumentedComparableHelper(String description, int n, Random random, int nRuns, Instrument instrumenter, Config config)
      Constructor for explicit random number generator.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of this Helper (for humans).
      n - the number of elements expected to be sorted. The field n is mutable so can be set after the constructor.
      random - a random number generator.
      nRuns - an (explicit) number of runs (for statistics).
      instrumenter - an implementer of Instrument.
      config - the configuration (note that the seed value is ignored).

    • InstrumentedComparableHelper

      public InstrumentedComparableHelper(String description, int n, Config config)
      Constructor to create an InstrumentedComparableHelper instance with an inferred number of runs from configuration.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of this Helper (for humans).
      n - the number of elements expected to be sorted. This value is mutable and can be set after the constructor.
      config - the configuration object.

      description - the description of this Helper (for humans).
      n - the number of elements expected to be sorted. The field n is mutable so can be set after the constructor.
      seed - the seed for the random number generator.
      nRuns - the explicit number of runs expected.
      config - the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public Helper<X> clone(String description, int N)
      Creates a duplicate of the current Helper instance configured with the specified description and number of elements.
      Specified by:
      clone in interface Helper<X extends Comparable<X>>
      Overrides:
      clone in class InstrumentedComparatorHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the cloned Helper (for humans).
      N - the number of elements expected to be handled by the cloned Helper.
      Returns:
      a new instance of Helper with the same configuration as the original, but updated with the provided parameters.
